respStmt.resp: Original EpiDoc Encoding for Siddham, following published edition unless otherwise noted in comments

licence.p: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 Unported Licence. To view a copy of the licence, visit thttps://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, USA.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_V01.xml file.

revisionDesc.change: Additional global changes for compatibility with DHARMA
Updating toward the encoding template v03

Initial import: harmonising file structure with DHARMA inscription template v02. Text and comments as inherited from the Siddham archive of January 2019, unless otherwise indicated (by a name and date in the comment). Comments are offered "as is" and do not represent a thoroughly considered or researched opinion.

lg.l:
kr̥tvā loka-hitodyama-prabha
vayā kīrtyā diśo bhāsayann

div.p:
bhagavat-paśupati-bhaṭṭāraka-pādānugr̥hīto bappa-pādānudhyāto bhaṭṭāraka-
mahārājādhirāja-śrī-narendradevaḥ kuśalī Ihatyān bhūmi-bhujo vartamānā
n bhaviṣyataś ca pratimānyānudarśayati viditam astu bhavatāṁ kasmiṁścid vastuny upa
kr̥tam avetya tat-pratyupakārotkaṇṭhita-matibhir asmābhir yūpa-grāma-draṅgasya sa
rva-tala-sahitasya bhaṭṭa-māpcokādhikārayoḥ prābālyād avaśyaṁ janasya mahatī
pīḍety anayor evādhikārayor apraveśena prasādaḥ kr̥tas tad evaṁ viditārthair e
tad-adhikāra-dvayādhikr̥tair anyair vāsmat-pāda-pratibaddhajīvanair alpāpi bādhā na kā
ryā yas tv etām ājñām anādr̥tyānyathā kuryāt kārayed vā tasyāvaśyam asmattas tībrataro
daṇḍaḥ patiṣyaty asmad-ūrdhvam bhāvidbhir api bhūpatibhis sukr̥ta-karaṇaika-sādhanā
-pūjitām pratijanma rājya-śriyam anububhūṣadbhir iha kīrtyāyur-ārogya-kalyāṇa-
rājya-śrī-samudayam īhamānaiḥ pretya ca śāśvatan dipvyam icchadbhiḥ sukham anu
bhavituṁ dikṣu cābhitaḥ śarad-āpyānoḍu-rājāmala-kiraṇa-mālāvabhāṣyamāna-prāleya-ma
hī-dharottuṅga-śikharāmalaṁ yaśas tanvadbhir ācandrārkaṁ sva-pratipāditānāṁ śāsanānāṁ sthiti
m icchadbhiḥ pūrva-bhūpatiṣu sagauravair bhūtveyam ājñā sapmyak pratipālanīyā Api caita
t pratyupakr̥tan na bahumanyamānair asmābhiḥ punar apy eṣāṁ pīṭāljādhikāram pratimucya
prasādīkr̥tam evam arthaṁ viditvaitad-adhikr̥tair na kaiścid etad-gatā pīḍā kartavyā yas tu ku
ryāt so ’smābhir na mr̥ṣyate tathaiva bhūpatibhir apy anumodanīyaṁ cira-sthitaye cāsya
prasādasya śilā-paṭṭaka-śāsanena prasādaḥ kr̥ta Iti svayam ājñā| dūtakaś cātra
kumārāmātya priyajīvaḥ saṁvaT 60 9 pauṣa-śukla-pañcamyāM||
